title: Eu West - Log in problems
body: Unable to connect to the authentication service. My username is SOPRANOS1989, server Eu West. Tryed all day but still the same problem. I used hextech repair tool, reinstalled client but still cant log in. Can anyone help?

replies.body:
It looks like it's been about 8 hours since you posted this topic, are you still having these login issues? 

If so, let's try updating some of your network settings as basic troubleshooting before digging too much further. Run through the steps on port forwarding and configuring your DNS listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Test those in a custom game and let me know how that goes.
